author: Baha'u'llah
source_text: أَنْتَ الَّذِيْ بِمَنِّكَ هَدَيْتَهُمْ وَسَمَّيْتَ نَفْسَكَ بِالرَّحْمنِ، لا إِلهَ إِلاَّ أَنْتَ العَزِيزُ الْمُسْتَعَانُ.
translation: Thou art, verily, He Whose grace hath guided them aright, He Who hath declared Himself to be the All-Merciful. No God is there but Thee, the All-Glorious, the Supreme Helper.
